abstract: Golfer Annika Sorenstam will captain European team at 2017 Solheim Cup in Des Moines.
snippet: Annika Sorenstam will be the captain of the European team at the Solheim Cup next year in Des Moines. Sorenstam, 45, won 72 times on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
lead_paragraph: Annika Sorenstam will be the captain of the European team at the Solheim Cup next year in Des Moines. Sorenstam, 45, won 72 times on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
